rooms.description: Widely accessible entrance with ramp for wheelchair access. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the main door to the east.
Spacious open-plan living area with ample natural light; designed for social gatherings and relaxation. Features large windows facing south for optimal sunlight according to Vastu.
Separate dining area integrated into the living space, ensuring smooth flow between spaces while allowing privacy when needed.
Compact kitchen with wheelchair-accessible counters and appliances. Designed to be safe and functional; uses natural lighting from north-facing windows.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom equipped with grab bars and non-slip surfaces. Placement in the northeast area for auspicious energy as per Vastu.

openings.description: South facing window to maximize sunlight and provide ventilation.
Accessible balcony door leading to the central courtyard for an integrated indoor-outdoor living experience.
